meanings.definition: Try hard to do or achieve something.
meanings.sent1: She endeavored to finish her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: He always endeavors to be kind to others.
meanings.sent3: The cat endeavored to catch the elusive red dot on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The seed endeavored to break through the hard soil to reach the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter endeavored to rescue the kitten from the tree.

meanings.definition: Make an effort to achieve a goal.
meanings.sent1: They endeavored to save money for their dream vacation.
meanings.sent2: The team endeavored to win the championship this year.
meanings.sent3: The penguin endeavored to slide on its belly across the ice.
meanings.sent4: The student endeavored to improve their grades by studying harder.
meanings.sent5: The chef endeavored to create a new recipe using unique ingredients.
